title: Maharashtra civic polls: 'Citizens' Manifesto' stresses urban reforms, transparency
description: An NGO has launched a 'Citizens' Manifesto' ahead of Maharashtra's civic polls. It proposes reforms for better service delivery and transparency. The manifesto emphasizes open civic data and citizen participation. It aims to empower urban local bodies for equ…
content: Ahead of the next phase of civic polls in Maharashtra, an NGO has launched the 'Citizens' Manifesto', outlining reforms aimed at improving service delivery, enhancing transparency through open civic … [+2799 chars]
